description:
This is the free version of TapTop, this version is limited to a game of 15 seconds and 3 different types of moles.
If you want to play during 30 seconds with 4 different moles (there is in the paid version a football mole that gives you 15 points but that you have to shoot twice), you can buy the paid version of TapTop for only $0,99.

------

Let’s face it, nobody likes moles. That’s why TapTop is so cool, you can shoot at moles as much as you want without having to stop! 

Enjoy 3 different types of moles: [-two different classical moles that give you 5 points each; -one blind mole that makes you lose 8 points; -a master-time mole that gives you 5 seconds of bonus time! (next updates should bring other awesome moles!)] and, if you’re really crazy, try to beat our best score: 1142 points! 

Good game and Good luck ;-) 

For more informations about our next games and projects, you can follow @tafle on Twitter ;)
